content: CES 2026 marked a shift from quirky AI gadgets to major players defining product categories and accelerating roadmap rollouts.
NVIDIA unveiled Vera Rubin chips at CES 2026, which offer multi-fold speed and energy-efficiency gains, along with a full robotics and embodied-AI stack.

AMD, Google, Samsung, and Amazon announced chips, device integrations, and ambient-assistant initiatives at CES 2026, demonstrating a race for infrastructure, consumer devices, and everyday AI experiences.
